summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Eddy Street, from 57th Avenue South to the northeast corner of lot 5, block 17, Brighton Beach Addition, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7493, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
